column1: Deficiency of a Substance that Promotes Masculinization
column2: rw262, 45-54 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Been on for only 1 week and can report improvement in performance in the gym, recovery time is shortened and sex desire and performance are already better. My insurance company is giving me a hard time but you can't put a price on the quality of life improvement. I would make other sacrifices to pay for this myself if the coverage is dropped.

column1: Deficiency of a Substance that Promotes Masculinization
column2: Joe , 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: After about 3 weeks of using the patches, I noticed that I had more muscle tone and that I had lost a few pounds (the weight loss probably helped me to look more toned). I also gained some strength. After two months, I looked as if I had been hitting the gym.  My wife was impressed. But the patches left itchy, red sores on my body that took several days to disappear. I switched to the GEL. The gel is not as convenient to use.  But, it does not give me those large, red welts. Ask your doctor for AndroGEL which is the gel form of Androderm. For the first several months, my insurance company helped with the cost. Then suddenly they decided that they would not cover testosterone therapy. I stopped using because of the cost.

column9: My husband started using the 4mg Androderm patches and noticed enlarged NON-tender lymph nodes in his neck. Has anyone had this experience?? He has a history of Hodgkin's lymphoma so he's seen his oncologist & has a biopsy scheduled. I'd rather this be some sort of rare reaction to the patches verses a Hodgkin's relapse.

column1: Deficiency of a Substance that Promotes Masculinization
column2: Anon, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I feel much better on the patch.  For an unknown reason my pituitary gland is not making LH.  The patch does not stick well and I have painful bright red raised rashes where the patch was applied.  I am young and like to take off my shirt so I am having a hard time finding places to put it.  Quality and frequency of erections is much improved.  My mood and memory are much better.  My condition is not just age related androgen deficiency so I have other things going on but the patch is much better and more consistent than Depo-T injections.

column1: Other
column2: Callahan, 55-64 Male  (Patient)
column9: I am a Type 1 diabetic for the past 29 years. Was often tired, moderately depressed, no desire to do much of anything. My testosterone level was extremely low. I started the Androderm patch about 15 months ago. I feel much better physically and mentally. I have more energy than before. The side effects has been an increase in allergic reaction to the site. Red patches, itchy and slightly burning are becoming more and more frequent. This didn't happen much for the first year, but increased a lot in the past three months. I would definitely recommend it as a help to those men with low T levels.

column1: Deficiency of a Substance that Promotes Masculinization
column2: HOPEFULL, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: 35-40yr old male, diabetic for 30yrs. Haven't had desire to make love. Wasn't able to stay hard, very tiered all the time and no matter what I did couldn't loose weight. Just started one day woke up this morning with a erection. I was going to open a bottle of champain, haven't happened since I was a teen ! Leading up to this all,I didn't even know about low Testosterone and the afects it has on men until I saw a comercial and heard the Guy talking about his symptoms and decided to tell my doctor what I was feeling, so I was tested and the results shock me my level was 130 ! At my age it should be in the 500 ! So here I am. To get the Patch to stick I use medical tape and it stays on. If you are like me and are feeling the way I did don't waste time and tell your doctor to check your Test, because you will be happy you did ! Good Luck & God Bless

column1: Deficiency of a Substance that Promotes Masculinization
column2: hausofish, 45-54 Male  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: Having been treated with injections, orally(testred), and using the androderm patch, I must say that I am very satisfied with the results. Although the patches don't stick as well as I'd like, this could be the result of my overly oily skin and persperation; however, with the addition of a little good quality tape, I've overcome this problem. I have seen an increase in energy, muscle mass, body hair, sexual desire and sexual ability(quality of erections). I've also seen a decrease in body fat, mood swings or depression and (being diabetic) blood sugar levels. My overall physical and mental health have improved and my sexual partners are also happy. Most excellent.

column1: Other
column2: Dogbreth, 45-54 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I am 54 years old and have had no desire for sex for about the past 5 years.  My wife and I have sex about every 6 months or so.  My doc said that my T is low and prescribed Androderm.  I have been on it for about 2 months now.  It sticks just fine and doesn't come off till I want it to.  I haven't showered with it on yet.  My sex drive had not improved.  I still have no energy.  I have seen a little more body hair than before, but that's about it.  I'll try it for a few more months.  If nothing changes, why use it?
